welcome_view.title: BOScoin wallet
welcome_view.title_description: Create your Seed, Manage your Wallet, Send and receive BOScoins.
welcome_view.guide_title: Step to make your account send BOScoin

guide.step2: Write down two keys and keep it safely (Very Important!!)
guide.step4: Input your seed address in the blank
guide.step5_2: button and you will see your account
guide.step6_2: button and input the public address of recipient into the blank

login_view.guide_line_1: Please input your Secret Seed to access your account.
login_view.guide_line_2: Please keep the Secret Seed to yourself, otherwise access to your wallet could be compromised.

error.invalid_secret_seed: Invalid Secret Seed or not enough balance.

send_coin.input_recipient_address: Input the Public Address of recipient
send_coin.input_amount: Input the amount you want to send
send_coin.total_will_be_sent: A total of {amount} BOS will be sent to Recipient

error.minimum_balance: Minimum balance after transfer must be at least {minimum_balance} BOS.
error.decimal_limit: You can only input to 7 decimal places.

key_generator.header: Click on generate to get a new keypair
key_generator.description_line1: This tool does not create an account.
key_generator.description_line2: You have to send create_account operation to the following
key_generator.description_line3: address with a starting balance so it can exist.
key_generator.warn_line1: Please copy your Public Address and Secret Seed to somewhere safe.
key_generator.warn_line2: Make sure you don't lose or reveal your Secret Seed to anyone.
key_generator.warn_line3: You may lose all of your coins!

record_seed.warn_text1_1: Be sure to record your Public Address and Secret Seeds securely.
record_seed.warn_text1_2: Be sure not to lose or share your Secret Seed. This is the key to your Wallet.
record_seed.warn_text2_1: PLEASE double check if you have the right Seeds.
record_seed.warn_text2_2: You are solely responsible for the security of your Seeds.
record_seed.warn_text3_1: Please confirm your Seeds again. You may lose all of your funds

transaction_confirm.text: Please confirm your Transaction once again.

wallet_view.you_just_received: You have received {amount} BOS for your last transaction
wallet_view.you_just_sent: You have sent {amount} BOS for your last transaction

error_popup.main_message: A temporary error has occurred. Please try again.
